name: Mocap, Mo' Problems (WIP)
description:
Controls

  • WASD: move
  • LSHIFT: hold to jog in place, move while holding to run
  • SPACE: hold to crouch
  • F: attack, unique animation while crouched

There is no win or lose state, so this is more of a tech demo for the character controller. I'll develop it further in the coming days after a break.

Run around and smack the naked dudes to turn them into ragdolls, its kind of hard to hit them if they're moving so try to sneak up behind them when they stop on their patrol route. 

The game has functioning stealth mechanics, but the level design is pretty non existent so there isn't much stealth gameplay (ran out of time).

If enemies see you, their alertness increases until they decide to chase you. If you break line of sight, they stop following and go back on patrol.
